tasks.name: Ingredients
tasks.description: This task will list the ingredients required to make a salad.

subtasks.name: Greens
subtasks.description: Choose your greens. Some popular options include lettuce, spinach, kale, and arugula.

subtasks.name: Vegetables
subtasks.description: Choose your vegetables. Some popular options include tomatoes, cucumbers, carrots, and bell peppers.

subtasks.name: Protein
subtasks.description: Choose your protein. Some popular options include chicken, shrimp, tofu, and hard-boiled eggs.

subtasks.name: Extras
subtasks.description: Choose any extras you want to add. Some popular options include nuts, seeds, cheese, and croutons.

prelude.factors: the ingredients required to make a salad, the preparation steps for making a salad, and the dressing options for a salad
prelude.final: You can find more information on how to make a salad at the current web page context.
